Launch your dream career, we’ll Be your guide

College Placement Cell made you feel sleepy?   We're your jolt of career caffeine!

Don't be limited

College limiting the number of companies you can sit in for the campus placement? Don't worry we got you !

Why job-hunt like a millennial in the time of Gen Z? We are your modern solution to the traditional placement problems! Sign up now!

We’re here to simplify your life

Not getting placed?

Hirekarma's automated platform uses powerful matching technology to connect you with the perfect job opportunity. We analyze your skills, interests and career goals to collect options for fresh graduate job opportunities. No more time waste or missed opportunities – find your dream job with Hirekarma!

Can’t find the perfect job from your college?

Struggling to land your dream job after graduation? You're not alone. Hirekarma offers you a comprehensive combo of resources and support which includes resume and LinkedIn optimization, personalized mentorship and access to the latest job postings. 

Is college limiting your package?

Don't let your college tier define your career path. Hirekarma empowers graduates from all backgrounds to showcase their talent and skills. With Hirekarma, a high-paying job and a fulfilling career are within reach, regardless of your college tier.

Get noticed!

Tailor your job application to land your dream job!
